Zach Miller

PhD Student

example@email.com
(123) 456-7891

Zach Miller is a PhD student in Oklahoma State University’s Simulation to Flight Applied Research Lab (S2FAR). Zach is from Fairhope, AL. He obtained both his Bachelor's and Master’s degrees in Mechanical Engineering from the University of South Alabama, with his Master’s thesis focusing on tethered autonomous VTOL drones. He is currently pursuing a PhD in Aerospace Engineering from OSU with the hopes to become a professor in the future. His hobbies include soccer, basketball, hiking, and traveling.
